channel.title: Adding shops 317 [pi]
channel.description: hey guys allot of people are asking me to add a shop in edge how do i go about adding one like adding the npc making it tradable and stuff please can someone help me thank you

item.title: Adding shops 317 [pi]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Shops.cfg just copy the layout of one of the shops and make one of your own.
Actionhandler.java to open shop: case npcid: c.getShops().openShop(shopid); break;
Prices.txt to change prices just do item id space price
Shopasssistant.java for special items: case itemid: return amount;

Read full topic
